topComments.author: Lynne Hughes
topComments.comment: I was blessed to be able to visit this place last week. I'm a tree hugger so it was one heck of an experience for me. You could literally feel the vibrations of love and history coming off of that tree. I was able to get a picture of me my girls and my future husband underneath it. It's always going to be on the highlight reels of my life. I will add my photos as soon as I get my boyfriend to send me them to me they were taken with his phone
